title: Can't Spectate Any Games
body: Not sure why but I'm unable to spectate ANY of my friends games...

replies.body:
It sounds like your client may have a hard time getting through the ports for spectator mode. This could be caused by the ports not being open on your local network, so I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step to solving this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your ability to spectate matches.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nLMJfOUr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-08T16:44:25.653+0000)
>
> It sounds like your client may have a hard time getting through the ports for spectator mode. This could be caused by the ports not being open on your local network, so I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step to solving this.
> 
> Let me know if those steps caused any change in your ability to spectate matches.

Thank you I will check that and see if it works later tonight then I'll message you back if it worked or not.
